title: Stuck sync on Goerli failed execution
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2021.10.3-alpha`

OS & Version: `Linux 5.10.0-9-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 5.10.70-1 (2021-09-30) x86_64 GNU/Linux`

Commit hash: `a481376a81d1bba61b12502634aeccd2ab767d9c` 

#### Expected behaviour
Continues to sync/follow the Goerli chain

#### Actual behaviour
Stuck waiting for headers after a failed execution. Issue persists through restart, and I've tried using `--bad.block` to unwind further (which doesn't seem to have any effect, still hangs on writing headers). I assume this is DB corruption, but is there any way to root cause further within Erigon? And if the former, any other way I can attempt to recover without re-sync?

```
[EROR] [10-20|15:11:43.092] [7/18 Execution] Execution failed        block=5690259 hash=0x7ac888d89f194ac7c3f785940e73167c0e14d20e581e4280b670793e3e885470 error="could not apply tx 0 from block 5690259 [0x94cd9d34010950205fe779e9805d9f739ec5c9be468bb6fbc39c431971f723db]: nonce too low: address 0x8D2daA2986a3C0BEba9399Ba9B3cE24F9E13aAdb, tx: 3 state: 4"
[INFO] [10-20|15:11:43.092] UnwindTo                                 block=5690258 bad_block_hash=0x7ac888d89f194ac7c3f785940e73167c0e14d20e581e4280b670793e3e885470

[INFO] [10-20|15:13:24.251] [1/18 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=5690258 blk/second=0.000 alloc="107.10 MiB" sys="500.57 MiB"
[INFO] [10-20|15:13:54.251] [1/18 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=5690258 blk/second=0.000 alloc="134.56 MiB" sys="500.57 MiB
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Not sure how to reliably reproduce on a fresh sync, but I've saved the broken DB.

#### Backtrace
Trace (from `docker kill -s SIGUSR1`) is [here](https://fs.overholts.dev/8ec81f72-b9f6-4ae7-be35-322eeaa8cc94.txt) if it helps.

Try next 3 commands to unwind (keep order of this commands is important): 
```
./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=500 --integrity.fast=false
./build/bin/integration stage_bodies --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=500 
./build/bin/integration stage_headers --datadir=<your_datadir> --unwind=500 
```

Hope we will investigate this issue soon (not yet).
Thanks, able to successfully sync after unwinding with those commands! Hope this helps others if they hit the same.

Commit hash: `574be074153fe7be29237881ecee56bd81e67c8`

We think issue must be fixed by: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/2879
